long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your browser tabs fresh with Makkie Page Refresh! This extension allows you to automatically refresh any webpage at custom intervals whether you are actively using the page, or when it's simply running on a second monitor in the background. Simply set the timer in minutes and seconds, monitor the countdown with either the extension open or docked, and enjoy seamless page reloads. Ideal for monitoring live data, dashboards, or keeping sessions active. 

With makkie page refresh we keep it simple, intuitive, and reliable!

At Makkie we believe in simple and intuitive design and just want to build great tools for great people. We do not log any data and are currently free for everyone! We hope you enjoy our tools! :)
